3: Hey there, o-ji-san!
...Why are you still here? Where are the others?
It's all sorted! Everyone's ready to hop already!
BUT! Commandant gave a special order to Nanami! And that's—bringing you out in one piece!
Don't fool around! On top of this horde of Corrupted, I also have to detonate explosives...
If it's somebody else, then it might be impossible...
But this is Nanami! So get ready for the wonder of wonders, miracle of miracles!
Hold on tight, pops!
Nanami brandishes and swings her weapon in one fell swoop, destroying every Corrupted intending to close in on her.
A steel cable shoots out from Nanami and latches on to Watanabe's arm.
Nanami DIY boom boom pops! FAI—YA!
Haha! Smooth as a criminal! Now we just need to drop those bombs, right?
You're the craziest lass I've ever seen...
Watanabe! Are you alright?
You all...
Suddenly, an unforeseen Corrupted tears the isolation doors in half with a bladed pair of wings.
De... tecting... thermal... reaction... purify...
That's...
Lu... ci...
Lucia! Look out!
